name: Elfhame Palace
oracle_text:
Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

name: Elemental Bond
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way."
@-Nissa Revane

name: Drumhunter
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: "I feel the vine-rhythm as my friends drive the beast to me. I will not miss my mark."

name: Dredge the Mire
oracle_text: Each opponent chooses a creature card in their graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: Fortunately, the reanimation spell just missed the long-dead colony of dung scorpions.

name: Dream Pillager
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
flavor_text: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.

name: Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.
flavor_text:
"Spread out, you idiots! Spread out!"
@-Marsden, party leader, last words

name: Dragon Tempest
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

name: Dragon's Hoard
oracle_text:
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.
{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Dragonmaster Outcast
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

name: Dragon Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor_text: "You'll bend to my will@-with or without your precious sanity."

name: Dragonlord's Servant
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Dragonkin Berserker
oracle_text:
First strike
Boast abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate for each Dragon you control.
Boast — {4}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

name: Draconic Disciple
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "If I am to die, I will die in the embrace of immeasurable flame."

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts@-on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Dismal Backwater
oracle_text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

name: Diregraf Captain
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Though its mind has long since rotted away, it wields a sword with deadly skill.

name: Dimir Signet
flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members@-and the doomed.

name: Diluvian Primordial
oracle_text:
Flying
When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Dictate of the Twin Gods
oracle_text:
Flash
If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor_text: Iroas and Mogis are as different in appearance as they are in personality.

name: Dictate of Heliod
oracle_text:
Flash
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor_text: "Daxos, I'm in need of a champion. Who else would I turn to but you?"

name: Devouring Light
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: "Even your shadow is too foul to tolerate."

name: Demanding Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

name: Deep Analysis
oracle_text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "The specimen seems to be broken."

name: Deadly Tempest
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
flavor_text: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

name: Dawn of Hope
oracle_text:
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
@-Emmara

name: Dauntless Escort
oracle_text: Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text: Elspeth's squires do not seek advancement. For them, no knightly glory could surpass the glory of serving their champion.

name: Curse of Disturbance
oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
flavor_text: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.

name: Curse of Bounty
oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.
flavor_text: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Crush Contraband
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

name: Cruel Revival
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: On Innistrad, Liliana embraced necromancy, honing her powers by practicing on scores of undead@-and sometimes the living.

name: Crucible of Fire
oracle_text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.
flavor_text:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
@-Sarkhan Vol

name: Crippling Fear
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Panic spread like wildfire as the demons of Immersturm poured into Bretagard, slaughtering as they came.

name: Coveted Jewel
oracle_text:
When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards.
{T}: Add three mana of any one color.
Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Condemn
oracle_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
@-Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Conclave Tribunal
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text:
"Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."
@-Gadwick, the Wizened

name: Commander's Sphere
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

name: Commander's Insignia
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
flavor_text: At the general's triumphant return, renewed strength surged through the soldiers' ranks.

name: Combustible Gearhulk
oracle_text:
First strike
When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

name: Collective Unconscious
oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control.
flavor_text: "The beasts of the wild are my senses. It is through their eyes that all knowledge shall come to me."

name: Collective Blessing
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +3/+3.
flavor_text: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.

name: Coastal Tower
oracle_text:
Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: The Capashen built the highest towers in Benalia to afford themselves the best view.

name: Cloudblazer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.
flavor_text: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

name: Cleansing Nova
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
flavor_text: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

name: Clan Defiance
oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying.
• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying.
• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Citywide Bust
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."
@-Libuse, Boros sergeant
